name: NPR
text:
In newly released footage, former officer Tou Thao seems increasingly agitated as the crowd gets more vocal, with onlookers repeatedly asking why George Floyd's vitals weren't being checked.

At one point, Thao says, "This is why you don't do drugs, kids." https://t.co/RZmUeyihIs

name: NPR
text:
Cheryl Barnes, who has diabetes, tells @IowaPublicRadio she has nothing left to eat but bread after Monday's deadly derecho storm.

“I know my blood sugar has been high, so I have to be extremely careful.” https://t.co/1wQd6nDfyM

name: NPR
text:
As part of the deal to normalize relations with the UAE, Israel has agreed to suspend its controversial plans to annex territory in the occupied West Bank — territory Palestinians have long hoped to be a part of a future state.
https://t.co/VND7hsHhoD

name: NPR
text:
Political leaders, community advocates and activists are cheering Kamala Harris' addition to the Democratic ticket as a powerful elevation of a woman of color — one that could change the perception of who is seen as a leader in the U.S.
https://t.co/xCHulsotEs

name: NPR
text:
President Trump has ordered TikTok's parent company, ByteDance, to sell its U.S. assets in 90 days, stating American authorities have "credible evidence" the Chinese tech giant could take action to imperil national security.
https://t.co/7C3YhAfG9Y

name: NPR
text:
A study from Duke University appears to conclude that wearing a neck gaiter is worse than no mask at all. 

But researchers say don’t get rid of your gaiter just yet. https://t.co/6lbxFssWza

name: NPR
text: Lawmakers in California are rushing to create a new financial protection watchdog agency by the end of August. They say that the pandemic has left millions of people more vulnerable to predatory lenders -- and that the federal watchdog quit doing its job.  https://t.co/agPCtveh0Z

name: NPR
text: For almost 30 years, T. Chick McClure and their father, Chas, were estranged, but four years ago that started to change. They decided to meet up for a long roadtrip through the West to get reacquainted -- for the first time as father and son. @StoryCorps  https://t.co/qwmt1ThjUy

name: NPR
text: Kenya's elephant population has more than doubled since the 1980s, and one national park is currently having a 'baby boom' thanks to a relief from drought — and the country's efforts to stop poachers. https://t.co/H8DqVowiRA

name: NPR
text:
In a landmark case, a Spanish court is expected to rule on murder and terrorism charges against a former Salvadoran military officer alleged to have played a key role in the 1989 executions of five Jesuit priests.  
https://t.co/48BZgS6Pxp

name: NPR
text:
Home sales are up — but so are evictions. @samsanders, @CardiffGarcia and @svaneksmith explain the housing market in the pandemic. 

Plus, @BobbyAllyn breaks down the battle between TikTok and the Trump Administration. https://t.co/dsLJg9sBJl

name: NPR
text:
Being a long haul trucker used to be a path to a middle class life. But in the last few decades, the trucking business has transformed.

Driving a truck now involves a mountain of debt.
https://t.co/l9NPc7gABJ

name: NPR
text:
Good Humor ice cream asked Wu-Tang Clan singer RZA to create a new jingle to replace "Turkey in the Straw," a ubiquitous ice-cream truck song with racist roots — and is teaching drivers how to replace the music box that plays it.
https://t.co/vXkEJ191ux

name: NPR
text:
By the time she put out her fourth album, Kathleen Edwards (@kittythefool) was a star — but she wasn’t happy. 

So she traded her music career for a coffee shop until a Nashville experience brought her back to making music. https://t.co/U70YQVRgp7

name: NPR
text:
"Studies showed that doctors downplayed Black patients' complaints of pain, prescribed weaker pain medication and withheld cardiac treatments from Black patients who needed them," said National Urban League CEO Marc Morial.
https://t.co/UeTGsxUNWD

name: NPR
text: The California ISO declared a Stage 3 emergency and implemented rolling blackouts as temperatures reached triple digits in many parts of the state. https://t.co/RZBSMyaLgy
